name: Gold Drill
description:
Introduction
Gold Drill is a classic arcade puzzle game where you connect pipesClear the stage and enjoy the rewards the girls give you!
How to play the game
It is cleared by connecting from the start point to the end point with the provided block.Unique blocks can help or hinder your playIf the game is difficult, refer to the hintEnjoy your joy by earning rewarded videos!
Key Features
3 girl friends embodied in 3D30 stages filled with blocks with unique characteristicsExtreme fun, challenge mode + 30 stages30 adult video records given as rewardsAn emergency mode that will protect you from your mother and sister!
